welcome.title: Welcome to ShreeRampur
welcome.subtitle: A model village committed to sustainable development and prosperity

history.title: Our Village History
history.p1: ShreeRampur has a rich history dating back to the 18th century. Named after Lord Ram, the village was established by freedom fighters who sought refuge in this serene location during India's struggle for independence.
history.p2: Over the years, ShreeRampur has transformed from a small agricultural settlement into a progressive rural community while preserving its cultural heritage and traditions.
history.p3: Today, our village is known for its agricultural prosperity, cultural richness, and community harmony, making it a model village in the district.

demographics.title: Village Demographics
demographics.subtitle: A snapshot of our diverse and vibrant community

panchayat.title: Meet Our Gram Panchayat
panchayat.subtitle: Dedicated leaders working for the village development

achievements.title: Village Achievements
achievements.subtitle: Recognitions and milestones that make us proud

2023.title: State-level Clean Village Award
2023.description: Recognized for exemplary waste management and sanitation practices.

2022.title: 100% Digital Literacy
2022.description: Achieved digital literacy for all residents between the ages of 14-60 years.

2021.title: Water Conservation Model Village
2021.description: Implemented innovative water harvesting and conservation techniques.

2020.title: Open Defecation Free Status
2020.description: Successfully achieved and maintained ODF status with 100% toilet coverage.

2018.title: Solar Energy Adoption
2018.description: First village in the district to adopt solar energy for street lighting and public facilities.

slide1.title: Welcome to ShreeRampur
slide1.subtitle: A model village committed to sustainable development and prosperity

home.welcomeParagraph1: ShreeRampur is a vibrant village located in the heart of rural Maharashtra, where tradition meets progress. Our Gram Panchayat is committed to the sustainable development of our village and the welfare of our residents.
home.welcomeParagraph2: Under the visionary leadership of our Sarpanch and dedicated Panchayat members, we are working tirelessly to transform ShreeRampur into a model village with modern amenities while preserving our rich cultural heritage.
home.emergencySubtitle: 24/7 Emergency assistance for our village residents
home.ambulanceDetails: 24/7 ambulance service with advanced life support
home.eventsSubtitle: Stay updated with the latest happenings in our village
home.ctaSubtitle: We're here to serve you. Reach out to us with your queries or feedback.
home.importantNotice: Important Notice: Please attend the Gram Sabha meeting on 25th June at 5:00 PM in the Village Hall. Your participation is valuable for village development!

services.title: Our Services
services.subtitle: Comprehensive services and schemes for the welfare of our residents
services.offeredSubtitle: The Gram Panchayat is dedicated to providing efficient services to all residents

certificates.title: Certificate Issuance
certificates.description: Birth, death, residence, income, and other essential certificates issued efficiently for village residents.

hallBooking.title: Community Hall Booking
hallBooking.description: Book our well-equipped community hall for various events, functions, and gatherings at affordable rates.

schemes.title: Scheme Registration
schemes.description: Assistance in applying for various government welfare schemes, subsidies, and benefits for eligible residents.

dispute.title: Dispute Resolution
dispute.description: Traditional village-level dispute resolution mechanism to resolve conflicts amicably within the community.

library.title: Library Services
library.description: Access to our village library with a collection of books, newspapers, and educational resources.

housing.title: Housing Assistance
housing.description: Guidance for government housing schemes like PMAY-G for eligible beneficiaries in the village.

health.title: Health Services
health.description: Coordination with primary health center for regular health camps and awareness programs.

tax.title: Tax Collection
tax.description: Collection of property tax, water charges, and other local taxes for village development.

process.title: How to Avail Services
process.subtitle: Simple process to access Gram Panchayat services

step1.title: Submit Application
step1.desc: Visit the Panchayat office or use our online portal to submit your application along with required documents.

step2.title: Verification
step2.desc: Our team will verify your application and documents as per the service requirements.

step3.title: Processing
step3.desc: Your request will be processed within the stipulated timeframe as per service norms.

step4.title: Service Delivery
step4.desc: Once approved, collect your certificate/document or avail the service as applicable.

govSchemes.title: Government Schemes
govSchemes.subtitle: Information about various welfare schemes available for eligible residents

pmKisan.title: PM Kisan Samman Nidhi
pmKisan.description: Direct income support of ₹6,000 per year to farmer families
pmKisan.eligibility: All small and marginal farmers with cultivable land
pmKisan.documents: Aadhaar Card, Land Records, Bank Account details

pmay.title: Pradhan Mantri Awas Yojana - Gramin
pmay.description: Financial assistance for construction of pucca houses
pmay.eligibility: Houseless families and those with kutcha/dilapidated houses
pmay.documents: Aadhaar Card, Income Certificate, Land documents

ayushman.title: Ayushman Bharat
ayushman.description: Health insurance cover of ₹5 lakh per family per year

mgnrega.title: MGNREGA
mgnrega.description: Guarantee of 100 days of wage employment in a financial year
mgnrega.eligibility: Adult members of rural households willing to do unskilled manual work
mgnrega.documents: Job Card, Aadhaar Card, Bank Account details

note.certificates: * Certificate services are available from 10:00 AM to 1:00 PM only.
note.sarpanch: * Sarpanch meeting hours: Wednesday & Friday, 3:00 PM - 5:00 PM

events.title: Village Events
events.subtitle: Stay updated with all the activities happening in ShreeRampur
events.upcomingEventsSubtitle: Be a part of our community gatherings and activities
events.noEventsDescription: Try changing your search criteria or check back later for new events.
events.annualEventsSubtitle: Mark your calendars for these recurring annual events

1.title: Blood Donation Camp
1.description: Join us for the annual blood donation camp organized in association with District Hospital.

2.title: Farmers Training Program
2.description: Learn about modern farming techniques and government schemes for farmers.

3.title: Village Cleanliness Drive
3.description: Community initiative to clean our village and promote proper waste management practices.

4.title: Women Empowerment Workshop
4.description: Workshop focused on skill development and entrepreneurship opportunities for women.

5.title: Free Health Check-up Camp
5.description: Comprehensive health check-up including eye examination, blood pressure, and diabetes screening.

6.title: Children's Day Celebration
6.description: Fun activities, games, and cultural programs for children on the occasion of Children's Day.

7.title: Village Tree Plantation Drive
7.description: Join us for a community tree plantation drive to make our village greener and healthier.

events.proposeDescription: We welcome community-driven events and initiatives. If you have an idea for an event that can benefit our village, please share it with us.

gallery.title: Our Gallery
gallery.subtitle: Capturing the essence and spirit of ShreeRampur
gallery.photoGallerySubtitle: A visual journey through our village life and activities
gallery.videoGallerySubtitle: Watch videos showcasing village events and achievements
gallery.ctaDescription: Do you have photos or videos of ShreeRampur village events or beautiful locations? Share them with us to be featured in our gallery.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: Reach out to the ShreeRampur Gram Panchayat

getInTouch.title: Get in Touch
getInTouch.description: We are here to assist you with any queries or concerns. Contact us through any of the following means:

feedback.title: Your Feedback Matters
feedback.description: We value your suggestions and feedback to improve our services. Please share your thoughts to help us serve you better.

map.title: Find Us
map.subtitle: Visit our office in ShreeRampur village
map.byBusDesc: Take state transport bus to ShreeRampur bus stop. The Panchayat office is 500m from the bus stop.
map.byCarDesc: From Pune, take the Pune-Solapur highway and turn at ShreeRampur junction. Follow the signboards to reach the village center.
map.byTrainDesc: The nearest railway station is Hadapsar (15 km). Take an auto-rickshaw or bus to reach ShreeRampur.
